name: Prodeus: The Elder Veil
summary: The Elder Veil is a DLC expansion to the retro first-person shooter action game Prodeus. Explore a new Greek-inspired environment with plenty of enemies to dispatch and weapons to use while airborne thanks to a trusty deployable chain for traversal.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Prodeus: The Elder Veil - Official Announcement Trailer | Realms Deep 2023
